org.fluidity.composition

Annotation Type Optional


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={PARAMETER,FIELD})
 @Qualifier(value=NONE)
public @interface Optional
    Annotates a component reference as optional dependency. An optional dependency will receive a null value upon dependency resolution if the dependency cannot be satisfied. Without this annotation, a ComponentContainer.ResolutionException is thrown in the same case.

    Usage

     @Component
 public final class MyComponent {

   MyComponent(final @Optional SomeDependency optional) {
     …
   }

   …
 }
